text: The Boy with Green Hair is a 1948 American family drama movie directed by first time director Joseph Losey and based on the 1946 short story of the same name by Betsy Beaton. It stars Pat O'Brien, Robert Ryan, Dean Stockwell, Barbara Hale, Walter Catlett, Teddy Infuhr and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1948 drama movies Category:1940s family movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Joseph Losey Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: The Boy with Green Hair
